content.question: Consider the series <math alttext="the sum from n equals 0 to infinity, of, open parenthesis, negative 1, close parenthesis, to the n power, times a, sub n" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup><msub><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>, where <math alttext="a, sub n, is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math> for all <math alttext="n" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="the limit as n approaches infinity, of, a, sub n, equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>→</mo><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munder><msub><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math>. Which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: The series converges, but there is not enough information to determine if the series converges absolutely.
There is not enough information to determine if the series converges or diverges.

content.answer: There is not enough information to determine if the series converges or diverges.
